Dear Acoustical Surfaces Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am reaching out to request the Sound Absorption Coefficient (SAC) for a 1″ panel of your Echo Eliminator™ product at a frequency of 125Hz.

Email: info@acousticalsurfaces.com
Website: https://www.acousticalsurfaces.com/
"""

# Create message

message["From"] = sender_email
message["To"] = receiver_email
